price: "Ey Adem oğulları! Size, şeytana ibadet etmeyin,  çünkü o sizin apaçık düşmanınızdır." demedim mi?
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam aʿhad ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā taʿbudū al-shayṭāna innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
